channel.title: Updates: Bills of Lading (Cargo Manifests) [Records Request]
channel.description: Updates on the Data Liberation Project's Bills of Lading (Cargo Manifests) request

item.title: Request Rejected
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On April 28, 2023, CBP emailed a rejection letter ðŸ“„, saying that the records are unavailable via FOIA. This statement seems to contradict the evidence, presented in the request letter, that such records have been obtained via FOIA before. The Data Liberation Project is seeking clarity on this matter.
